name: (FREE) BOSS LEFT
description:
MADE IN 2014

THIS GAME FEATURES A ZOMBIE WAR THAT DOMINATES AN EARTH AREA AND YOU NEED TO ESCAPE, 1 DAY IN A HAZARDOUS JOURNEY.

THIS GAME DOES NOT SAVE FEATURES, YOU'RE BEING CHALLENGED IF YOU CLOSE THE GAME, EVERYTHING ZERO OR YOU'LL LOSE EVERYTHING, AND YOU'LL HAVE TO START AGAIN. THESE ARE THE RULES

MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS
INTEL I3
2GB RAM
